Text: Enron North America Corp NYMEX Hedge Exemption ApplicationsI do have a futures trading account Tricia Tlapek Ext Forwarded by Patricia TlapekHOUECT on PM Enron North America Corp From Mark Taylor ENRON PM Sent by Enron NRON To All Enron Houston EveryoneinECTCalgary EveryoneinECTLondon EveryoneinECTPortland EveryoneinECTNew York EveryoneinECTDenver EveryoneinECTOslo EveryoneinECTSingapore EIAustralia Buenos Aires Argentina Office Staff Buenos Aires Argentina TGS Office Staff Enron EveryoneEOGDenver Enron EveryoneEOGCalgary cc Subject Enron North America Corp NYMEX Hedge Exemption Applications We are in the process of preparing applications for position limit exemptio ns for ENAs NYMEX energy commodities futures trading These applications require that ENA represent whether its officers employees owners or agen ts have a power of attorney control or have a financial interest in any other related commodity futures account either individually or acting with another person pursuant to express or implied agreement Please direct any responses to my paralegal Tana Jones via intercompany email or call her at by the end of business Friday June if you have any power of attorney control or have a financial interes t in any commodity futures account other than an ENA or other trading affiliate account IF YOU DO NOT HAVE A COMMODITY FUTURES ACCOUNT YOU DO NOT NEED TO RESPOND TO THIS REQUEST

Re Enron North America Corp NYMEX Hedge Exemption Applicationsat this time From Tana Jones on AM To Patricia CT cc Subject Re Enron North America Corp NYMEX Hedge Exemption Applications Patricia I need to know what futures products you are trading Patricia Tlapek PM To Tana CT cc Subject Enron North America Corp NYMEX Hedge Exemption Application s Tana I do have a futures trading account Tricia Tlapek Ext Forwarded by Patricia TlapekHOUECT on PM Enron North America Corp From Mark Taylor ENRON PM Sent by Enron NRON To All Enron Houston EveryoneinECTCalgary EveryoneinECTLondon EveryoneinECTPortland EveryoneinECTNew York EveryoneinECTDenver EveryoneinECTOslo EveryoneinECTSingapore EIAustralia Buenos Aires Argentina Office Staff Buenos Aires Argentina TGS Office Staff Enron EveryoneEOGDenver Enron EveryoneEOGCalgary cc Subject Enron North America Corp NYMEX Hedge Exemption Applications We are in the process of preparing applications for position limit exemptio ns for ENAs NYMEX energy commodities futures trading These applications require that ENA represent whether its officers employees owners or agen ts have a power of attorney control or have a financial interest in any other related commodity futures account either individually or acting with another person pursuant to express or implied agreement Please direct any responses to my paralegal Tana Jones via intercompany email or call her at by the end of business Friday June if you have any power of attorney control or have a financial interes t in any commodity futures account other than an ENA or other trading affiliate account IF YOU DO NOT HAVE A COMMODITY FUTURES ACCOUNT YOU DO NOT NEED TO RESPOND TO THIS REQUEST

Request for natural gas technical analysisForwarded by Patricia TlapekHOUECT on AM Tim NRON AM To Mike A CT cc Patricia CT Anna nron Subject Request for natural gas technical analysis Hello Mike I work in Rodney Malcolms Commercial Transaction Group focusing on developing energy management relationships with large volume industrial energy consumers Due to the volatility and high price levels of the natural gas contract these consumers of natural gas are extremely concerned about this exposure and they are asking for our assistance in helping them manage this exposure One of the tools that these customers are requesting is technical analysis of the natural gas contract so as to determine entry points for their hedges To the extent you could assist us with this analysis we can proactively meet these customer requests and increase our deal flow Please advise as to the availability of your assistance Thank you Tim
the neural network siteand Username june with Passwordtrendchange

Re FollowupI have left a message wBruce requesting the password for the neural network site and am waiting for his reply Trish Vince J Kaminski AM To Patricia CT cc Subject Re Followup Trish I could not access his neural network site It requires access password Vince From Patricia Tlapek PM To Vince J CT cc Subject Followup Forwarded by Patricia TlapekHOUECT on PM on AM To cc Subject Followup Good Morning I enjoyed visiting you yesterday afternoon to discuss the opportunity at Enron Sounds exciting challenging and a good use of a lot of my skills and experience I look forward to further talks hopefully this coming week I mentioned a couple web sites and dont know if they came through clearly on the phone with my sore throat The neural network approach to timing can be found at ptonline The introductory piece on technical analysis I wrote for Forbescom and the glossary can be found at I am also working with long time friend and neighbor Steve Nison with his site and you can see the first on line lesson for free at Have a nice weekend Hope to hear from you next week Bruce M Kamich CMT
